content: the cousteau cowl by lesley karpiuk the pink toque / geeksoap net https //www ravelry com/designers/lesley-karpiuk inspired by the jacques cousteau hat by typy and created to match ​ ​ http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/jacques-cousteau-hat materials us size 4 16 circular needle or dpns approximately 145 yards of worsted weight yarn i used michaels impeccable brand in true gray stitch marker tapestry needle for finishing directions cast on 140 stitches row 1 10 k1 p1 ribbing around ​ now switch to k3 p2 row k3 p2 rib around until piece measures 8 5 from cast on edge final 10 row k1 p1 ribbing around ​ finishing bind off and use tapestry needle to sew first bound off stitch to the last one and weave in ends the final piece from cast on to bind off edge should be approximately 10 this pattern and photos copyright ©2010 to lesley karpiuk / thepinktoque / geeksoap feel free to sell whatever you make resulting from the use of this pattern but please do not redistribute or reproduce without permission model my husband lucas pattern updated december 2019
